Job Description: Salesforce Developer

About Us:

We are seeking a Salesforce Developer to join our dynamic team. As a Salesforce Developer, you will play a crucial role in the analysis, design, development, implementation, testing, and maintenance of applications, data, and integrations. Your expertise and collaboration will ensure integrity and consistency across our ecosystem.

Responsibilities:

  • Analyze, design, develop, implement, test, and maintain applications, data, and integrations.
  • Actively engage with other developers and architects to ensure integrity and consistency across the ecosystem.
  • Utilize Software Development Lifecycle phases to deliver high-quality applications, incorporating current best practices and methodologies (e.g., continuous integration and deployment, agile/iterative development, test-driven development).
  • Adhere to standards and methodologies in project delivery, security, data privacy, integrations, architecture, development (including testing, documentation, and deployment), and automation.
  • Stay updated on new technologies, trends, architectures, and implementation techniques related to applications, integrations, and data delivery.
  • Participate in business, technical, and design discussions with team members and customers.
  • Deliver prioritized technology efforts while meeting expectations for schedule, scope, and quality.
  • Effectively identify, manage, mitigate, and escalate risks to appropriate levels of management.
  • Perform other duties as assigned.

Required Qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, or a related field.
  • Five years of programming experience in an applications development or consulting environment, including two years of experience developing data models in an enterprise environment.
  • Familiarity with one or more data modeling tools.
  • Salesforce certifications are highly encouraged.

Preferred Experience:

  • Experience with tools such as Salesforce, CPQ, Mulesoft, Experience Cloud, Docusign, Netsuite, and/or Magento.

If you are passionate about Salesforce development, possess the required qualifications, and are eager to contribute to impactful projects, we encourage you to apply for this position. Join us and make a difference in the world of Salesforce development!
